text:

text: No, you need to concentrate resources where they'll do the most good. Right now, that appears to be Georgia and Arizona. Other states may emerge. But I don't think another quixotic campaign against Mitch is advisible.

text:
Yes they are. 

The thing is that what it means to be "conservative" has changed to the point where Trump is the result. This is a process that started in the 90s, Reagan, Goldwater, and Buckley would not recognize modern conservatism and would likely be called RINOs today.
